product.title: The B Book | Book Club by Early Moments
product.ingress:
The letter A always gets top billing, but in The Berenstains’ B Book, B is just as important. And the Berenstain Bears are just the ones to teach early readers about the letter B. The Berenstains’ B Book is fun and wacky. Whether it's backward bike-riding bears, a beautiful baboon, or a blue bull, children will delight at the fascinating sounds and the wonderful tongue-twisters created by Stan and Jan Berenstain in The Berenstains’ B Book.

Tie-in Activity: Encourage your baby’s babbling as you read, since the B sound is often among a baby’s first vocalizations. For an older child, gather a ball, block, this book, and something that doesn’t begin with B, and let your child determine what doesn’t belong.
